title: Advanced Online Physics Experiment Design Using Interactive Video

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD). Conducting projects to analyze experimental data through mathematical modeling

learning_goals: Graduate students systematically control ≥3 independent variables in virtual physics experiments using interactive video tools (e.g., PhET simulations), visualize collected data in tables/graphs, and present results in 5-minute oral presentations
It recreates laboratory collaboration scenarios and presents problem-solving strategies through branching interactive features in videos.
Process collected experimental data using mathematical and statistical analysis tools to create a lab report.
Diagnose at least three causes of experimental errors using feedback mechanisms in an online lab environment.

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) device management system

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
